trends: There has been one other sighting in Nice
There were no other sightings in Nice on or around March 21st 2011
divs: sighting detailsi am based in monaco, monte carlo. the date is 21\3\11 at 10.30 this morning (about 15 minutes ago) i went outside the office for a smoke. it is a perfectly clear sunny day. in the sky, very high up. i spotted some bright white\silverish...orbs?? i suppose. at first i only seen one, but as i adjusted my eyes i saw there were more following. about 7 or 8 in total. all moving in the one direction and weaving in and out amongst each other. they were moving about the same speed as a plane but i could hear no sound. they looked very similar to the ones in new york that i had seen recently in a video....has there been any explanation of that yet? this sort of sighting seems to be very common of late. any explanations?
